des:
Silux Control® is a home automation system designed to be integrated into all homes, offices or any building without the need for cabling or exhaustive installation work.

Silux Control® was designed to be affordable so that the luxury of home automation is available to everyone. The system features a modular design meaning that you only buy what is important in your life, and you can then in your own time add additional devices to the automation system.

By using Silux Control® you will also be able to control your home by using the Android or IOS app on a mobile phone or Alexa.


Silux Control® will allow you to spend more time on the things you want to do and spend less time worrying about your home.

Let's start using this skill, Click the "Enable Skill" button on the Alexa App and login with your Amazon account. On the Silux Control® App please add your Amazon email in the Alexa Section. Remember to use devices names as you have named them on the Silux Control® App.
